description: This file defines the RoomDetailsScreen widget in Flutter, displaying details of a room including its ID and amenities, with a button to navigate to a booking creation screen.

classes.name: RoomDetailsScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays details about a specific room, including an image, amenities, and a button to initiate booking.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the UI for the RoomDetailsScreen, including app bar, room image, details, amenities, and a booking button.
